name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
透過簡短的寫作作業和課堂討論，本課程將幫助培養學生的英語寫作技巧和作文策略。  重點關注寫作和學術論點之間的關係，我們將在本學期學生開始研究和寫作他們的高級專案時應用這些技能。

Through short writing assignments and class discussion, this course will help develop students’ English writing skills and strategies for composition.  Focusing on the relation between writing and academic arguments, we will apply those skills this semester as students begin the research and writing of their senior projects.
schedule:
Week1: Intro
 
2-4:Senior Project proposals
 
5-6: Research I: field of study questions
 
7-8:Research II: primary texts
 
9:Midterm
 
10-12: Grammar review
 
13-14:Research III: secondary texts
 
15-17:Exercises in Style
 
18:Finals week
